nodes.text: Juggernaut Five was an Imperial Combat Assault Transport used to move rhydonium on the planet Morak, which was commandeered by Din Djarin and Migs Mayfeld around 9 ABY. The transport was attacked by raiders attempting to destroy its valuable rhydonium cargo to the planet's Imperial refinery, but was successfully defended by Djarin. It was subsequently destroyed when Mayfeld fired on its Rhydonium shipment, causing a chain reaction that annihilated the refinery it was operating out of.
